summary: A high school substitute English teacher resorts to murder to protect her murderous dark past while seducing a student who begins to suspect her true identity.
cast: Amanda Donohoe|Dalton James|Natasha Gregson Wagner|Eugene Robert Glazer|Patricia Gage|Shelley Owens|Mark Wahlberg|Brigitta|David Frankham|Christian Svensson|Cusse Mankuma|Molly Parker|Lossen Chambers|D. Neil Mark|Martin Martinuzzi|Justine Priestley|Fran Gebhard|Pat Bermel|Gary Jones|Meredith Bain Woodward|Sheila Patterson|Deryl Hayes|Andrew Wheeler|Bobby Stewart|Douglas Newell|Katherine Banwell|Glen Mauro|Gary Mauro|Martin Cummins
title: La profesora
